Donations

We appreciate every single donation we receive here at CCC. All the money goes towards improving the organisation and how it supports vulnerable children in South Sudan. The money you donate goes towards the accommodation for the vulnerable children under our protection, as well as school materials, tuition fees, and meals for the children at CCC.

Please continue to donate to CCC, as little or as much as you are able to do. Every amount makes a difference.

Give in kind donations details, Small funds from 50-1,000 USD, Second hand clothes, Bed sheets, Food item NFI, Scholastic materials, School shoes
